changelog:
Fixed more bugs
Added a /discord rawmsg command
Added whitelist option for commandlog

Fix server stopping not working
Fix update checker
Implement URL Encoded advancement message
Fix death message custom embed

More bug fixes
Implement permissions

Large discord integration rewrite adding new features and fixing long existing bugs
Old configuration can be used as-is

Added custom status
Added tellraw
Added option to disable chat message editing for compatibility reasons
Fixed lots of bugs

Added new event handling methods for addons
Otherwise mostly a bug fix update
Don't forget to use 'discord migrate' in console when updating from below 2.6.0

Added new event handling methods for addons
Otherwise mostly a bug fix update
Don't forget to use 'discord migrate' in console when updating from below 2.6.0

Fix a few issues
Add new custom command parameter
Fix default webhook name
Bump minimum Forge version to 40.1.0
Fix mentions in webhooks
Fix mentions in any non-chat message
Remove /discord stop and /discord restart ingame commands
Update against new discord update
Hopefully last member retrieval fix, commands should work again properly now

ALPHA Version, expect bugs!
Another member retrieval fix

ALPHA Version, expect bugs!
Fix joining not working when having no required roles set for whitelist mode
Fix whitelist mode link command output
Fix /say and /me commands

ALPHA Version, expect bugs!
Fix messages file not generated
Fix attachments again

Note that this is still beta

Moved DM commands to slash commands

Bug Fixes:
Fix advancement spam, mod now checks if advancement is complete
Fix several crashes if setup isn't done properly, showing error in log instead
Fix attachments and embeds

Fix crash on load
Rework config commands
READ CURSEFORGE CHANGELOG BEFORE UPDATING!
Multiple bugfixes
Port to neoforge (now required 1.20.4 and onwards)

Fix update checker
Implement URL Encoded advancement message
